input_placeholder: App link or ID, e.g. https://apps.qoo-app.com/app/6172
disclaimer: This app is not affiliated with or endorsed by QooApp Limited.
splits_warning:
These are not meant to be installed individually!
You must install them alongside the base APK (using adb or an XAPK file).
xapk_step1: 1. Download the base APK and select it in the input box below.
xapk_step2: 2. Download one or more of the split APKs and select them in the input box below.
xapk_step3: Once you're done, press the Create button below to get your XAPK file.
turnstile_error: Turnstile challenge failed with error code {code}
xapk_error: Cannot create XAPK for this app.
checksum_mismatch: Base APK checksum mismatch (incorrect or corrupted file).
split_identify_fail: Failed to identify split APK: {name} (incorrect or corrupted file).
duplicate_split: Duplicate split APK files were selected.
